name: Spook - a zombie tag game
description:
Spook - A zombie tag game.

Its DEAD simple. Your in a construction site, a zombies hunting you and there are weird cubes that help you score. How high can you score before you DIE?

Pro tip! Use the environment! Getting to high ground or jumping over objects he has to go around are the only ways to outpace him!!

WASD and Space to jump!
